thinking: The task is to purchase a set of paperclips. The page displays several options. I will add the first paperclip to the cart.
Now that an item is in the cart, I need to go to the cart to checkout.
Now that I'm in the cart, I need to click the checkout button.
I need to fill in the required information (name, phone, address) and then place the order.
I need to fill in the remaining required information (phone, address) and then place the order.
I need to fill in the remaining required information (address) and then place the order.
I need to fill in the remaining required information (address) and then place the order.
Fill out name, phone and address and then click the place order button. I will use the current element indexes.
Select standard shipping, fill out name, phone and address and then click the place order button. I will use the current element indexes.
